DOC.HEADLINE: COMMUNITY NEWS FOCUS : COUNTYWIDE ; APPLICATIONS OPEN FOR IMAGINATION FEST
DOC.TEXT: Applications are available for Orange County-based artists and organizations seeking to participate in the 1995 Imagination Celebration of Orange County . The deadline is Oct . 28 . Marking its 10th anniversary next April , the Imagination Celebration is an annual festival of the arts for children , teen-agers and their families presented by the Orange County Performing Arts Center and the Orange County Department_of_Education . The celebration annually draws 170 # 000 people to an array of workshops , performances , hands-on events and exhibits at various sites . The festival will be presented at more_than 30 sites around the county . Last year ' s event included a street festival at Cal State Fullerton and musical_performances by teens in Costa Mesa . To receive an application , call ( 714 ) 556-2122 , Ext . 236 .
